definitions.definition: The layer of the Earth's atmosphere that is directly above the stratosphere and directly below the thermosphere .
The part of the Earth's mantle below the asthenosphere and above the outer core .

main_definition: ( meteorology ) The layer of the Earth's atmosphere that is directly above the stratosphere and directly below the thermosphere .
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) The part of the Earth's mantle below the asthenosphere and above the outer core .
